verbs.description: By [V: meeting] [ARG1: Kim Jong Un] , Donald Trump is legitimizing the brutal dictator ’s place on the world stage .
By meeting Kim Jong Un , Donald Trump [V: is] legitimizing the brutal dictator ’s place on the world stage .
[ARGM-MNR: By meeting Kim Jong Un] , [ARG0: Donald Trump] is [V: legitimizing] [ARG1: the brutal dictator ’s place on the world stage] .
